details.title: Modulation of Ring-Laser Mode Coupling
details.abstract: This paper develops an analytical, algebraic formalism that predicts effects induced in ring lasers by phase modulation, corresponding both to mode-decoupling mechanisms deliberately incorporated in the ring laser and to naturally occurring periodic or random angular or linear accelerations. The analysis is based on an approach that seems potentially convenient in the analysis of other systems that are physically stable but mathematically nonlinear.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
